title: Lower priority queue for stupid reason
body: i play a game i cant connect to the game in champion loading screen i keep crashing and keep trying but i cant get on so i wait till the game is finished and i get lower priority queue cause of your great loading screen this is unfair when it was not even my fault i couldn't get on it this is stupid so you should fix this issue

replies.body:
It could be that you're having connection issues to Riot's servers. I suggest you test only Custom games until you've found a solution.

What ISP are you with? What OS are you on?

ISP = telstra
OS = windows 8

EDIT: also ping was perfectly fine

Check out [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) for some common solutions, and test them out.

Additionally, make sure that there's no programs running in the background (including firewalls, anti-viruses and synchronisation services (like iTunes or Google Chrome, which you usually have to use the Task Manager to end completely (close will just hide it from view))).

Best of luck.

Before i play league i disable firewall anti virus open task manager and close everything that i don't need is there no way i can get lower priority queue off or do i have to play the 5 games? Or do i have to play them

Penalties will not be removed from your account under any circumstances. At least that's the policy.

Did you try the possible solutions in the page I linked you to?
